title: In My Lightcone
text:
Welcome to my exploration of ideas across past, present, and future lightcones. Here I document thoughts, discoveries, and connections spanning technology, science, and the boundaries of curiosity.
The concept of a lightcone from physics describes the region of spacetime that can causally influence or be influenced by a given event. Everything I write about here exists within my informational lightcone - connected to my past experiences and potentially shaping future understanding.
